parameters.content:
## File naming convention when uploading file to Drive

Upload file to the "Blogs" folder in "Marketing". Make sure it contains **Content** if it is a content file and **Preview** if it is a preview file

### Expected Snippet Formats:

**Blog Post Content Snippet:**
```typescript
export const newBlogPost: BlogPostContent = {
  slug: 'new-blog-post',
  title: 'New Blog Post Title',
  date: '2025-01-20',
  authors: ['Author Name'],
  tags: ['tag1', 'tag2'],
  image: '/image.jpg',
  excerpt: 'Blog post excerpt...',
  content: 'Blog post content...',
  richContent: [...]
};
```

**Blog Preview Snippet:**
```typescript
export const newBlogPreview: BlogPreview = {
  slug: 'new-blog-post',
  title: 'New Blog Post Title',
  date: '2025-01-20',
  excerpt: 'Blog post excerpt...',
  image: '/image.jpg'
};
```
